title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Cloud-Based Learning Design Evaluation Capability Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Cloud Platform Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply cloud-based learning design evaluation criteria based on the TPACK framework with 80% accuracy.
Learners can iteratively improve mobile-optimized cloud learning designs at least three times.
Through peer and self-assessment, learners can diagnose the integration level of technology, content, and pedagogy in learning design.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
